name: Pong Smash
description: a classic from the 70's Pong created by Atari in 1972, and now I decide for training to develop this copy, well improved, I finished it in 1 week, and it was very turbulent researching, tutorials that could help me in the development, but anyway Pong Smash is not nothing revolutionary but it was made with great care. have fun and if possible send me a feedback
